original_title: God's Generals: Vol. 7: Aimee Semple McPherson
overview: Equipped with a divine healing anointing, Aimee McPherson's focus remained always on the lost. Each week, Aimee would fill and empty her five-thousand-seat Los Angeles auditorium twenty-one times, offering priceless healing and teaching to each attendee. But the work of God did not come without cost; hers was a life of private heartache and great persecution.
title: God's Generals: Vol. 7: Aimee Semple McPherson
